class.name: GodotIDEPlugin
class.brief_description: Editor plugin that provides an integrated VS Code web IDE within Godot.
class.description:
GodotIDEPlugin adds a new main screen tab to the Godot editor that loads VS Code for the web (vscode.dev) using the WebView control from the godot_wry module. This provides developers with a full-featured code editor integrated directly into the Godot editor interface.
The plugin automatically creates a WebView instance and configures it to load vscode.dev with appropriate settings for an IDE experience. If the godot_wry module is not available, it will display an informative fallback message.
Features: - Full VS Code web interface within Godot - Automatic WebView configuration for IDE use - Graceful fallback when WebView is unavailable - Integrated as a main screen tab alongside Scene, Script, AssetLib, etc.
